definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: open region, hamlet;—only pl. [[פְּרָזוֹת]]: ´[[אֶרֶץ פ]] Ez Eze 38:11 a land of hamlets (opp. [[חוֹמָה]] etc.); [[תֵּשֵׁב יְרוּשָׁלַם]] ´[[פ]] Zec 2:8 as open regions shall Jerusalem sit ([[יׇשַׁב]]
); ´[[עָרֵי הַפּ]] Es 9:19 (opp. [[שׁוּשָׁן]] v:Es 9:18); perh. Ju Jdg 5:7 (´[[פ]] for [[פְּרָזוֹן]], cf. SyrVer Targum GFM).
